title: Ogre's Club
summaries: The Ogre's Club is a pet-summoning item that has a 25*1/4 (25%) chance of dropping from the Ogre in Master Mode. It summons an Baby Ogre that will follow the player around.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a baby ogre
'No other uses besides smashing.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
